Game Mechanics Change Log

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Contents

  • 1 Weds 27-30.3.2008
  • 2 Wednesday 19.12.07
  • 3 Sunday 16.12.07
  • 4 Friday 14.12.07
  • 5 Thursday 13.12.07

Weds 27-30.3.2008

finished placing at least preliminary information on most pages for skills. Created a Tumbler minigame for the Pick Locks skill. Made initial notes on the NPC_XML based on my limited understanding. Darker Dreams 08:39, 30 March 2008 (CEST)

Wednesday 19.12.07

  • Adding to skills (bring down list of "special" combat Skills- created skills of Power Attacks, Fencing, and Dirty Tricks- and provided a very basic definition of Maneuvers) small refinment to combat system. Darker Dreams 02:18, 20 December 2007 (CET)

Sunday 16.12.07

  • Unilaterally, made the magic proposal the presumptive system. Cleaned up some order and added some ideas. Darker Dreams 19:38, 16 December 2007 (CET)

Friday 14.12.07

  • Added a proposal for the magic system.

Thursday 13.12.07

  • seperating Game Mechanics from Setting. Darker Dreams 04:12, 14 December 2007 (CET)
